body_html: Thanks for the review, @apaszke. Quick question about how PRs work (I'm pretty new to PRs on github): should my edits to address your comments be new commits on this branch, or should I squash them into the current commits via git rebase -i in the interest of keeping a clean commit history?

body: Thanks for the review, @apaszke. Quick question about how PRs work (I'm pretty new to PRs on github): should my edits to address your comments be new commits on this branch, or should I squash them into the current commits via `git rebase -i` in the interest of keeping a clean commit history?
